ardon was a sorcerer dying on or before the midâ€“8 century DR.
At some point before , Sardon had a romantic relationship with Saeraede Lyonora, an apparently unique Netherese ghost-like entity. He fed her his own lifeforce for a time, lasting about as long as Brandagaeris lasted, but shed drained him completely by the end.
